atg.dms.patchbay
Interface MessageSink

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbandonedOrderEventListener, ADCEventMonitor, AgentAuditQueue, Cache, DeploymentManager, DisqualifyRemovedItemClosenessQualifiers, ElectronicFulfiller, FulfillerSystem, HardgoodFulfiller, atg.commerce.fulfillment.InventoryFulfiller, LocalizingInventoryManager, MessageForwardFilter, MessagePipelineMapper, MessagePipelineMapper, MessageSender, MessageSinkDataListenerService, OrderCanceller, OrderCanceller, OrderChangeHandler, OrderFulfiller, PricingTools, RepositoryInventoryManager, ScheduledOrderTools, SimpleInvoiceMessageSink, SimpleInvoiceMessageSink, SourceSinkTemplate
public interface MessageSink

This is the interface that must be implemented by components in the patch bay configured as message sinks or message filters.

          Class version string

 void receiveMessage(java.lang.String pPortName, javax.jms.Message pMessage)

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

receiveMessage

void receiveMessage(java.lang.String pPortName,
                    javax.jms.Message pMessage)
                    throws javax.jms.JMSException
This is called to notify the component that a Message has arrived through the given input port. The MessageSink should be prepared to handle concurrent calls of this method from multiple Threads.

Throws:
javax.jms.JMSException
